name: Lyuda's Temple
description:
You are a chosen disciple who needs to prove his valor to his god by conquering his temple.

You have the ability to change from a light and agile form to a stronger more heavy form on the fly. Use their different abilities to find the two part of a sacred medallion and show Lyuda that you are worthy of him.

This was a project done by three students in 9 months at e-artsup.

Pierre-Alexandre Bartel : Project Management, Game Design, Level Design, Programming, FX   

 Yuva Taleb : Character design, Props 3D, FX, UI

https://yuvataleb.artstation.com/

Tim Bossart : Environment Art, Props 3D

https://www.artstation.com/mazteba

Mathis Marchal : Music composer

https://www.instagram.com/marchalmathis/
